text: @AngrierWHStaff Living blue in SC is, well, different. Sumter County is 15th in population, but 7th in number of cases. @henrymcmaster is trying his damndest to outdo Georgia & Florida in a race to be @realDonaldTrump's favorite shitty governor.  https://t.co/igIB021HmR
